text: (yaani) aasamaanon ke rasaton par phir moosa ke khuda ko jhaank kar (dekh) loon aur main to use yaqeenee jhootha samajhata hoon, aur isee tarah phiraun kee badakiradaarayaan usako bhalee karake dikha dee gayeen theen aur vah raahe raasta se rok diya gaya tha, aur phiraun kee tadbeer to bas bilkul gaarat gul hee theen
